list.name: Ganyu
list.desc:
"Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu

"This press release is due tomorrow… I suppose I could work through the night and get it done.”

list.name: Diona
list.desc:
"Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona

1% energy dedicated to mixing drinks, 99% to... denying the reality of familiar.

list.name: Kaeya
list.desc:
"Frostwind Swordsman" Kaeya

Specializes in awakening knightly virtues in others.

list.name: Chongyun
list.desc:
"Frozen Ardor" Chongyun

"Ugh, summer… Please pass us by in peace…"

list.name: Kamisato Ayaka
list.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

list.name: Mona
list.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.

list.name: Xingqiu
list.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

list.name: Barbara
list.desc:
"Shining Idol" Barbara

Ready to heal hearts and soothe souls at any time.

list.name: Diluc
list.desc:
"Dark Side of Dawn" Diluc

His heart is his greatest foe.

list.name: Xiangling
list.desc:
"Exquisite Delicacy" Xiangling

As a chef, she is practically omnipotent.

list.name: Yoimiya
list.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

list.name: Bennett
list.desc:
"Trial by Fire" Bennett

Once you know that you will certainly lose, then you must certainly know the way to win.

list.name: Cyno
list.desc:
"Judicator of Secrets" Cyno

The card bears the General Mahamatra's ardent fondness, which reminds one of the scorching sun hanging above the desert

list.name: Keqing
list.desc:
"Driving Thunder" Keqing

She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.

list.name: Razor
list.desc:
"Wolf Boy" Razor

"Cards, hard."

"But… friends…"

list.name: Fischl
list.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"

list.name: Collei
list.desc:
"Sprout of Rebirth" Collei

"'Shouting the name of your card loudly will increase its power many-fold'… You've got to be kidding, right?"

list.name: Noelle
list.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

list.name: Ningguang
list.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

list.name: Jean
list.desc:
"Dandelion Knight" Jean

Never believes that she has done well enough — not until final victory is hers, anyway.

list.name: Sucrose
list.desc:
"Harmless Sweetie" Sucrose

"You can't rate the strength of an as-yet untested deck!"

list.name: Rhodeia of Loch
list.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

list.name: Mirror Maiden
list.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness…

list.name: Fatui Pyro Agent
list.desc:
"Blade of Settlement" Agent

"There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."

list.name: Maguu Kenki
list.desc:
"Ingenious Machine" Maguu Kenki

Even today, it still patrols the place where fate was severed.

list.name: Stonehide Lawachurl
list.desc:
"Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

list.name: Jadeplume Terrorshroom
list.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

list.name: Klee
list.desc:
"Fleeing Sunlight" Klee

Every card you draw may bring in an "explosive surprise."

list.name: Beidou
list.desc:
"Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean" Beidou

"Remember this day, you almost won money from the Captain of the Crux."

list.name: Kujou Sara
list.desc:
"Crowfeather Kaburaya" Kujou Sara

"This is an act of righteousness."

list.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
list.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

list.name: Eula
list.desc:
"Dance of the Shimmering Wave" Eula

It's but a game. I won't hold a grudge should luck happen to be on your side.

list.name: Kamisato Ayato
list.desc:
"Pillar of Fortitude" Kamisato Ayato

The divinely-blessed cypress sprouts new leaves.

list.name: Tighnari
list.desc:
"Verdant Strider" Tighnari
From a certain perspective, experience does not hold parity with wisdom.

list.name: Arataki Itto
list.desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

list.name: Shenhe
list.desc:
"Lonesome Transcendence" Shenhe

The mortal realm briefly gracing, like a wisp of smoke vanishing.

list.name: Tartaglia
list.desc:
"Childe" Tartaglia

Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.

list.name: Hu Tao
list.desc:
"Fragrance in Thaw" Hu Tao

"Send one, send 'em all!"

list.name: Amber
list.desc:
"Outrider" Amber

If you want to be a great player...

First, you have to have the courage to sit down and play.

list.name: Raiden Shogun
list.desc:
"Plane of Euthymia" Raiden Shogun

The tranquil thunder shall scatter this world most ephemeral.

list.name: Yae Miko
list.desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

list.name: Venti
list.desc:
"Windborne Bard" Venti

"As the four seasons in turn shall say their piece, so the four winds too shall never cease.

"Of course, to look at it differently, I am the one who should be credited here, and not they."

Credits should be given where credits belong — if not for the bard who pens the song, then who shall ensure that these tales are passed on!?"

list.name: Xiao
list.desc:
"Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao

The Vigilant Yaksha, the bane of all evil

list.name: Zhongli
list.desc:
"Vago Mundo" Zhongli

A hidden gemstone can illuminate the whole earth, bright and unrivaled as a star.

list.name: Nahida
list.desc:
"Physic of Purity" Nahida

The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.

list.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
list.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

list.name: Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames
list.desc:
Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames

From chapters of canon revealed comes much heeded admonishments.

list.name: Electro Hypostasis
list.desc:
Electro Hypostasis

Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.

Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

list.name: Candace
list.desc:
Golden Vow: Candace

The crimson sand flows, an oath to defend.

list.name: Yanfei
list.desc:
Wise Innocence: Yanfei

One who fails to revise the classics is liable to fall foul of the law.

list.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
list.desc:
Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves: Kaedehara Kazuha

Flowers and birds are a dear pleasure to one winding under the moonlight.

list.name: Lisa
list.desc:
"Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa

Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

list.name: Albedo
list.desc:
"Kreideprinz" Albedo

Nigredo and calx, rubedo and citrinitas.

list.name: Qiqi
list.desc:
"Icy Resurrection" Qiqi

Circulating endlessly, life goes on.

list.name: Dehya
list.desc:
"Flame-Mane" Dehya

The eyes of the vulture, the soul of the lion, the free daughter of the desert.

list.name: Wanderer
list.desc:
"Eons Adrift" Wanderer

Tribulations uncounted, trials unknowable.

list.name: Yaoyao
list.desc:
"Burgeoning Grace" Yaoyao

An adeptal constitution.

list.name: Baizhu
list.desc:
"Beyond Mortality" Baizhu

Living with many maladies, where will one find a cure?

list.name: Dori
list.desc:
"Treasure of Dream Garden" Dori

The Mora, the merrier!

list.name: Nilou
list.desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

list.name: Layla
list.desc:
"Fantastical Evening Star" Layla

As night falls, the stars swirl and the moon wanders amidst dreams.

list.name: Yelan
list.desc:
"Valley Orchid" Yelan

The world is vast and infinite, the solitary one comes and goes as she pleases.

list.name: Lyney
list.desc:
"Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney

Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?

list.name: Lynette
list.desc:
"Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette

The firmament glimpsed in a reflected moon.

list.name: Gorou
list.desc:
"Canine Warrior" Gorou

The leader of the pack, leading the soldiers onward!

list.name: Alhaitham
list.desc:
"Admonishing Instruction" Alhaitham

Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

list.name: La Signora
list.desc:
"The Eighth Harbinger" Signora

The crimson dawn was reflected in her pupils, and at last, she unfolded her flaming wings and flew towards the light.
"But that light is not the dawn, dear Rosalyne. That is a sea of flame that will consume everything."
Yet it mattered not, for she knew in her heart that the flames had devoured her long ago.

list.name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
list.desc:
"Poetry and Secret Histories" Eremite Scorching Loremaster

Those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.

list.name: Thunder Manifestation
list.desc:
"Lingering Hatred" Thunder Manifestation

As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

list.name: Dvalin
list.desc:
"Dragon of the East" Dvalin

"How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky."

"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."

list.name: Azhdaha
list.desc:
Ancient Geovishap Ancestor: Azhdaha

The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

list.name: Thoma
list.desc:
"Protector From Afar" Thoma

A protector from abroad, loyal to the end.

list.name: Sayu
list.desc:
"Mujina Ninja" Sayu

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

list.name: Cryo Hypostasis
list.desc:
Cryo Hypostasis

Code name: Daleth. A high-purity Cryo entity.
It doesn't seem all that good at ball sports...

list.name: Millennial Pearl Seahorse
list.desc:
Millennial Pearl Seahorse

One of the two sovereigns standing at the apex of the Fontemer Aberrants. Poets and authors view it as a proud and noble creature, thus bestowing it with its high-flown title.

list.name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
list.desc:
Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage

...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...

list.name: Charlotte
list.desc:
"Lens of Verity" Charlotte

"Your credible source of the unbelievable truth!"

list.name: Neuvillette
list.desc:
"Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" Neuvillette

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

list.name: Kirara
list.desc:
"Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara

On tails twain and padded feet, to all doors shall she deliver.

list.name: Emperor of Fire and Iron
list.desc:
Emperor of Fire and Iron

One of the two sovereigns who once stood at the apex of the aberrant species of the Fontemer. An Armored Crab that has avoided predation, and has constantly partook in hunting and eating. Its imperial title is made half in awe, and half in jest.

list.name: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents
list.desc:
Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents

The world shall be severed, and all shall be obliterated.

list.name: Faruzan
list.desc:
"Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan

Simple machines, mysterious world

list.name: Kuki Shinobu
list.desc:
"Mender of Tribulations" Kuki Shinobu

Master of all trades, deputy of the oni.

list.name: Wriothesley
list.desc:
"Emissary of Solitary Iniquity" Wriothesley

Guilty waters run deep.

list.name: Furina
list.desc:
"Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina

Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

list.name: Xinyan
list.desc:
"Blazing Riff" Xinyan

Time to rock!

list.name: Yun Jin
list.desc:
"Stage Lucida" Yun Jin

Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.

list.name: Kaveh
list.desc:
"Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

list.name: All-Devouring Narwhal
list.desc:
Cryptic Creature: All-Devouring Narwhal

In the most fantastical of fables, or perhaps in the most rabid of ravings, the true stars in the depths of cosmos are just as full of life as on Teyvat, while the universe itself is akin to an ocean.

Perhaps the universe's infiltration of Teyvat has never ceased, and perhaps the drawing of borders around this world was the work of a higher will, meant to protect it.

list.name: Consecrated Scorpion
list.desc:
Remnant Venom: Consecrated Scorpion

A poisonous scorpion that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. It now commands perilous lightning.

list.name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
list.desc:
Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent

A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.

list.name: Guardian of Apep's Oasis
list.desc:
Wisdom's End: Guardian of Apep's Oasis

Apep found itself swallowed alone amidst the scenery of the catastrophe. All the people, gods, dragons, beasts, birds, and fish. All memories, wisdom, words, and hatred were ground into colorless dust, and the last of the moonlight burned away into a rain of pale fire, falling on the barren land.

...

Apep once deemed the bottom of the sea of sand to be its grave, not the palace of a dispossessed king. The poison of "wisdom" would soon free Apep from the hatred and anger festering within it over countless moons. Apep had grown weary of the colorless apocalypse. Then, finally, the young god and the golden Traveler let it recall once again, even though the verdant land it once ruled had been reduced to this gilded wasteland, even though Apep and its many offspring had grown twisted and wretched to secure their continued survival therein, Apep still treasured the sight and scenes of the oasis sparkling in its heart.

list.name: Chevreuse
list.desc:
Executor of Justice: Chevreuse

Righteous Enforcer of the Law.

list.name: Navia
list.desc:
Helm of the Radiant Rose: Navia

"The Soaring Yellow Rose."

list.name: Frost Operative
list.desc:
Filtered in Liquidation: Frost Operative

Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field.

list.name: Freminet
list.desc:
"Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet

Alone under the cold light of stars.

list.name: Xianyun
list.desc:
"Passerine Herald" Xianyun

Chivalrous Shadow, Shrouded in Cloud.

list.name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
list.desc:
"Razorwave Roamer" Hydro Hilichurl Rogue

Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.

list.name: Chiori
list.desc:
"The Thundering Seamstress" Chiori

Couturiere of Countless Colors

list.name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
list.desc:
Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

Praise be unto the Abyss, the Wisdom of Corrosion.

list.name: Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer
list.desc:
"Whirling Memories" Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer

"The children of the desert have a rich tradition of song and dance. Originally used to praise and serve the gods, the crafts were later adapted for battle and the seduction of kings."

list.name: Rosaria
list.desc:
"Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria

"Light creates shadow, but shadow will not be controlled by light."

list.name: Sigewinne
list.desc:
"Wondrous Dragonheir" Sigewinne

"Pure spirit, heed my wish."

list.name: Golden Wolflord
list.desc:
"King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord

A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.

list.name: Mualani
list.desc:
"Splish-Splash Wavechaser" Mualani

Swellrider of Perennial Springs

list.name: Clorinde
list.desc:
"Candlebearer, Shadowhunter" Clorinde

Vanquisher of Phantoms, Vigil of the Long Night

list.name: Arlecchino
list.desc:
"Dire Balemoon" Arlecchino

Solitary Balemoon in a Sky of Fading Stars.

list.name: Kinich
list.desc:
"Turnfire Hunt" Kinich

Fulfiller of Commissions, Flame Bearer of the Canopy.

list.name: Kachina
list.desc:
"Mottled Gold Yet Unsmelted" Kachina

Wrought of tears and mettle.

list.name: Emilie
list.desc:
"A Thousand Scents Traced" Emilie

Like fragrance fading, like mist dissipating.

list.name: Sethos
list.desc:
"Wisdom's Measure" Sethos

A visitor from the sea of sand, profound in providence.

list.name: Xilonen
list.desc:
"Ardent Flames Forge the Soul" Xilonen

The peaks resound, their golden veins gleaming.
